en.auto_clean_tip: The equipment will automatically clean up after the pet leaves the toilet
en.delay_clean_time_tip: The interval between pet leaving the toilet and performing automatic cleaning
en.cleaning_interval_tip: During the set time, the equipment will not be cleaned repeatedly after the pet uses the toilet multiple times
en.cat_litter_type_title: Please select the type of cat litter to use
en.cat_litter_type_tip: Different cat litter will affect the cleaning method of the equipment and the remaining amount of cat litter
en.cat_litter_type_tip_1: *To avoid unclean cleaning and excessive consumption of cat litter, it is recommended to use cat litter with strong agglomeration and small particles. Attention: Large particle cat litter with a length exceeding 2cm and a diameter exceeding 3mm will not be filtered by the filter. Unfiltered cat litter will slide into the toilet box. It is recommended to use it with Xiaopei Smart Cat Toilet's dedicated cat litter to improve cleaning efficiency.
en.reminder_deodorizer_block: Reminder for replacing the deodorizer block
en.child_lock_tip: After opening the child lock, the buttons on the device are not available
en.warehouse_notice_tip: Notify when the collection bin is full
en.clean_notice_tip: Notify when the set sand bin cleaning cycle arrives
en.toilet_record_notice_tip: Notification when pets enter or exit the equipment
en.deodorizing_block_notice_tip: After closing, the app will not push a reminder of the expiration of the deodorization block
en.warehouse_desc_0: Remaining space in the collection bin
en.warehouse_desc_2: Remaining space in the collection bin
en.warehouse_illustrate_0: 1. In a single cat family, the maximum battery life of the collection bin is 14 days; But in non business travel situations, do not leave the toilet clean for 14 days!
en.warehouse_illustrate_1: 2. In areas with hot or humid weather, it is recommended to clean the toilet every 2-3 days to avoid the breeding of bacteria or mosquitoes. Adjustments can be made according to the actual situation.
en.warehouse_illustrate_2: 3. Although the toilet can support a single cat family with a battery life of 14 days, the pooper should not be lazy and maintain a healthy and clean toilet environment for cats.
en.cleaning_reminder_switch_tip: After activation, a reminder will be given at the set time
en.cleaning_reminder_tip: It is recommended to clean the sand bin every two weeks, which is beneficial for the health of cats; The sand bin can be washed all over with water, and there are circuit components inside the upper cover and base, so it cannot be washed all over.
en.clear_toilet_reminder_switch_tip: After activation, a reminder will be given at the set time
en.dryAgentDesc1: *The use of a pet feeder with a desiccant can enhance the drying effect, achieve enhanced freshness, and help prevent pet food from getting damp and moldy.
en.dryAgentDesc2: *To achieve the desired drying effect and prevent pet health problems caused by moisture in pet food, it is recommended to replace the desiccant once a month. According to regional weather differences, the degree of humidity varies, and areas with high humidity can shorten the replacement cycle depending on the situation.
en.no_scheduled_cleaning: The current timer list is empty
en.warning_open_schedule: Please turn on the timed cleaning switch first before proceeding with timed addition.
en.dp_fault_5: The drum cannot be in place
en.roller_state_desc_1_1_4: Cat enters, timed cleaning has been paused
en.roller_state_desc_3_1_4: Cat entry, dumping cat litter paused
en.roller_state_desc_4_1_4: Cat entry, leveling cat litter paused
en.roller_state_desc_1_1_6: Cat approaching, scheduled cleaning has been paused
en.roller_state_desc_3_1_6: Cat approaching, dumping cat litter paused
en.roller_state_desc_4_1_6: Cat approaching, leveling cat litter paused
en.roller_state_desc_0_2_0: The device has been paused. To ensure that the cat can use it normally, there will be no operation for 10 minutes and the device will continue to operate
en.cancel_rotation_tip: The device will stop the current task and return the sphere to its normal position. Are you sure?
en.roller_state_desc_5_2_0: The device has been paused. To ensure that the cat can use it normally, there will be no operation for 10 minutes and the device will continue to operate
en.roller_state_desc_11_1_0: Equipment malfunction, resolved within 10 minutes, equipment will continue to execute
en.roller_state_desc_3_2_0: The device has been paused. To ensure that the cat can use it normally, there will be no operation for 10 minutes and the device will continue to operate
en.roller_state_desc_1_3_0: Scheduled cleaning in progress, please wait
en.roller_state_desc_2_3_0: Automatic cleaning in progress, please wait
en.plan_clean_tip: The equipment will be cleaned according to the set time
en.max_scheduled_cleaning: The number of scheduled cleaning has reached the upper limit
en.less_than_10_minute: The time interval between each timer cannot be less than 10 minutes
en.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this plan?
en.reset_repeat_tip_sub: The replacement cycle will restart, please confirm that you have completed the desiccant replacement.
en.toilet_record_in_day: Cat stays for {0} minute and {1} seconds
en.error_1: , the toilet is not in place
en.error_5: , the drum cannot be in place
en.roller_install: The drum cannot be in place
en.upper_cover_tips: Installation instructions for the upper cover:
en.upper_cover_desc: There are alignment holes in the body and upper cover, which are equipped with components for adsorption and alignment. When installing, please align the upper cover with the body holes.
en.roller_install_tip_1: Can not the drum be in place?
en.roller_install_desc_1: There are multiple sets of sensors inside the drum, and the equipment installation process may cause abnormal operation of the drum due to misalignment - not in place.
en.roller_install_desc_2: Please remove the upper cover, remove the drum, reposition it, align the bucket door to the front (refer to the diagram), and then cover the upper cover. After the installation is completed, operate the device reset button to rotate the ball to the correct position.
en.equipment_failure_restart: fault cleared within 10 minutes, continuing with
en.do_not_disturb_sub_title: {0}~{1} is the device's undisturbed time period. If you need the device to work, please turn off the undisturbed mode.
en.fault_motor_stall: Protection mechanism triggered, device paused, please check and reposition the sand bin
en.attached_action_tip: After startup, the device will automatically embed before each cleaning
en.force_action_title_0: If you want to forcibly clean, please confirm that the cat is not near the device, otherwise continue to wait!
en.force_action_title_1: If you want to forcibly dump cat litter, please confirm that the cat is not near the device, otherwise continue to wait!
en.force_action_title_2: If you want to forcibly level the cat litter, please confirm that the cat is not near the device, otherwise continue to wait!
en.force_mode_1_running: Forced cleaning in progress, please wait
en.force_mode_4_running: Forced dumping in progress, please wait
en.force_mode_5_running: Forced leveling in progress, please wait

zh.auto_clean_tip: 宠物离厕后设备将自动清理
zh.delay_clean_time_tip: 宠物离厕后自动清理的间隔时间
zh.cleaning_interval_tip: 在所设时间内，宠物多次如厕后设备将不会重复进行清理
zh.cat_litter_type_title: 请选择使用的猫砂种类
zh.cat_litter_type_tip: 不同的猫砂将影响设备的清理方式和猫砂余量
zh.cat_litter_type_tip_1: *为避免清理不干净、猫砂消耗过多，建议使用结团性强、颗粒小的猫砂。注意：长度超过2cm,直径超过3mm的大颗粒猫砂将无法被滤网过滤，没过滤的猫砂会滑入集便盒，推荐搭配小佩智能猫厕所专用猫砂，提升清理效果。
zh.child_lock_tip: 打开童锁后，设备上的按键不可用
zh.clean_notice_tip: 设定的砂仓清洗周期到达时通知
zh.deodorizing_block_notice_tip: 关闭后，app将不会推送除臭块到期的提醒
zh.warehouse_illustrate_0: 1、在单猫家庭中，集便仓最长续航时间为14天；但是非差旅情况下不要14天不清理集便仓哦！
zh.warehouse_illustrate_1: 2、天气炎热或潮湿的地区，建议每2~3天清理一次集便仓，避免滋生细菌或蚊虫，可根据实际情况进行调整。
zh.warehouse_illustrate_2: 3、虽然集便仓能支持单猫家庭续航14天，但铲屎官可不要偷懒哦，保持给猫咪提供健康干净的如厕环境。
zh.cleaning_reminder_switch_tip: 开启后将在设定时间提醒
zh.cleaning_reminder_tip: 建议每两周清洗一次砂仓，有益猫咪健康；砂仓可全身水洗，上盖和底座内有电路器件，不可全身水洗。
zh.clear_toilet_reminder_switch_tip: 开启后将在设定时间提醒
zh.dryAgentDesc1: *宠物喂食器搭配干燥剂使用，可加强干燥效果，达到增强保鲜效果，有助于防止宠粮潮湿、发霉的作用。
zh.dryAgentDesc2: *为达到理想的干燥效果，防止宠粮受潮造成宠物健康问题，建议干燥剂1个月更换1次。根据地区天气差异，潮湿程度不一，湿度较高的地区可视情况缩短更换周期。
zh.warning_open_schedule: 请先打开定时清理开关，再进行定时添加。
zh.roller_state_desc_0_3_0: 正在手动清理中，请稍候...
zh.roller_state_desc_0_1_4: 猫咪进入，手动清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_1_1_4: 猫咪进入，定时清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_2_1_4: 猫咪进入，自动清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_3_1_4: 猫咪进入，倾倒猫砂已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_4_1_4: 猫咪进入，平整猫砂已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_0_1_6: 猫咪靠近，手动清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_1_1_6: 猫咪靠近，定时清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_2_1_6: 猫咪靠近，自动清理已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_3_1_6: 猫咪靠近，倾倒猫砂已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_4_1_6: 猫咪靠近，平整猫砂已暂停
zh.roller_state_desc_0_2_0: 设备已暂停，为保证猫咪能正常使用，10分钟无操作，设备将继续运行
zh.cancel_rotation_tip: 设备将停止当前任务，并将球体回归正位，是否确认？
zh.roller_state_desc_5_2_0: 设备已暂停，为保证猫咪能正常使用，10分钟无操作，设备将继续运行
zh.roller_state_desc_11_1_0: 设备故障，10分钟内故障解除，设备将继续执行
zh.roller_state_desc_3_2_0: 设备已暂停，为保证猫咪能正常使用，10分钟无操作，设备将继续运行
zh.roller_state_desc_1_3_0: 正在定时清理中，请稍候...
zh.roller_state_desc_2_3_0: 正在自动清理中，请稍候...
zh.plan_clean_tip: 设备将根据所设时间进行清理
zh.less_than_10_minute: 定时间隔不得少于10分钟
zh.sure_delete: 确定删除这个定时任务吗？
zh.reset_repeat_tip_sub: 更换周期将重新开始计时，请确认您已完成干燥剂更换。
zh.toilet_record_in_day: 猫咪停留 {0} 分 {1} 秒
zh.upper_cover_desc: 在机身与上盖中分别有对位孔，内部装有元器件，可起到吸附和对准作用，安装时，请将上盖与机身孔对位安装。
zh.roller_install_desc_1: 滚筒内有多组传感器，设备安装过程可能会因为没有对位从而导致滚筒运行异常——不到位。
zh.roller_install_desc_2: 请将上盖取下，取下滚筒，重新放置，将桶门对准正前方安置（参考示意图），然后盖上上盖。安装完成后，操作设备复位按键，让球体转动至正位。
zh.do_not_disturb_sub_title: {0} ~ {1} 为设备免打扰时间段，如需设备工作，请关闭免打扰模式。
zh.fault_motor_stall: 保护机制触发，设备暂停、请检查并重新放置砂仓
zh.attached_action_tip: 开启后每次清理前设备会自动预埋
zh.force_action_title_0: 若要强行清理请确认猫咪不在设备附近，否则继续等待!
zh.force_action_title_1: 若要强行倾倒猫砂请确认猫咪不在设备附近，否则继续等待!
zh.force_action_title_2: 若要强行平整猫砂请确认猫咪不在设备附近，否则继续等待!
zh.force_mode_1_running: 正在强行清理中，请稍后...
zh.force_mode_4_running: 正在强行倾倒中，请稍后...
zh.force_mode_5_running: 正在强行平整中，请稍后...
